mapper.select: SELECT ID, IN_QUANTITY as insertQuantity, OUT_QUANTITY as releaseQuantity, TOTAL_PRICE as totalPrice, CREATED_AT as createdAt, MODIFIED_AT as modifiedAt FROM SETTLEMENT

SELECT YEAR(s.CREATED_AT) as year, MONTH(s.CREATED_AT) as month, COALESCE(SUM(s.IN_QUANTITY), 0) AS inQuantity, COALESCE(SUM(s.OUT_QUANTITY), 0) AS outQuantity FROM SETTLEMENT AS s GROUP BY YEAR(s.CREATED_AT), MONTH(s.CREATED_AT) ORDER BY YEAR(s.CREATED_AT) ASC, MONTH(s.CREATED_AT) ASC
